name: Boss Battle Simulator
description:
WASD  - Move

Left Click - Attack, click multiple times to do a combo-attack!

B - Pause & access leveling for health and stamina

Mouse-Wheel Scroll to zoom in and out.

on the Main Menu, hold z,x,c,v to reset save data if things go crazy

Between rounds a shop will appear in the center of the map (though watch out i haven't fixed it entirely and you can end up skipping a round of upgrading, so just try not to linger in the direct center of the arena)

Survive four rounds, and you will face One Big Boss. whom you will never defeat, but you may try as you like, in futility!! As a plus, you'll earn money for how much you hurt him.

unfortunately my level-scaling mechanic doesn't work for the enemies, otherwise it'd be a constant struggle!

also couldn't quite get the combat system working right on the enemy's end, but it turned out well enough for only a week's work, i dare to say.

If you like it, consider helping buy a fatigued programmer an energy drink through https://www.paypal.me/setolyx !
